column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place is SO FREAKING GOOD and SO FREAKING AFFORDABLE. Everything on the menu is to die - I have yet to have a single thing that didn't make me say "OHMGUDDDD" (that's a mouth full of food 'oh my god'). Their sangria is famous for a reason
column2: their bacon wrapped dates are mouthwatering
column3: and their fun desserts let you try everything just like their entrees! Great spot for a date
column5: group outing- legit anything. Can't wait to be back!
